name: SparkleWand Puzzle
description:
Unique Puzzle Game !
Seemingly easy casual game at first but will still challenge you.
Test you skill and perception and try pulling off tricky shots.
Fun for all ages !

You can hit the bubbles that are not crystalized (are not inside a hexagon) using the wand.
Match 3 or more same color bubbles to make them burst.
If you leave a crystalized bubble isolated by bursting all bubbles adjacent to it then you can hit and de-crystalize it.
Bubbles in the center zone will always be crystalized.
If a bubble touches a crystalized bubble and there is no color matching it will also become crystalized.
If crystalized bubbles reach the area where the player character can move it's game over.
